00026 namespace reflection
00027 {
00028         namespace detail
00029         {
00031 
00032                 template<class T>
00033                 struct _type_of_builtin_ {
00034                         typedef builtin_type<T>* ret_t;
00035                         static ret_t get() {
00036                                 static builtin_type<T> type;
00037                                 return &type;
00038                         }
00039                 };
00040 
00042 
00043                 template<class T>
00044                 struct _type_of_pointer_ {
00045                         typedef pointer_type* ret_t;
00046                         static ret_t get() {
00047                                 static pointer_type type(_type_of_<T>::get());
00048                                 return &type; 
00049                         }
00050                 };
00051 
00053 
00054                 template<class T>
00055                 struct _type_of_reference_ {
00056                         typedef reference_type* ret_t;
00057                         static ret_t get() {
00058                                 static reference_type type(_type_of_<T>::get());
00059                                 return &type;
00060                         }
00061                 };
00062 
00064 
00065                 template<class T>
00066                 struct _type_of_user_ {
00067                         typedef user_type* ret_t;
00068                         static ret_t get() {
00069                                 static type_desc<T> desc;
00070                                 return desc.get_type(); 
00071                         }
00072                 };
00073 
00075 
00076                 template<class T>
00077                 struct _type_of_ 
00078                 {
00079                         typedef typename t_strip<T>::nomod pure;
00080 
00081                         typedef typename if_then_else<t_strip<T>::is_ptr, _type_of_pointer_<typename t_strip<pure>::noptr>,
00082                                         typename if_then_else<t_strip<T>::is_ref, _type_of_reference_<typename t_strip<pure>::noref>,
00083                                         typename if_then_else<is_user_type<T>::value, _type_of_user_<pure>, _type_of_builtin_<pure>
00084                                         >::value
00085                                         >::value
00086                                 >::value type_function;
00087 
00088                         typedef typename type_function::ret_t return_type;
00089 
00090                         static return_type get()
00091                         {
00092                                 return type_function::get();
00093                         }
00094                 };
00095 
00097                 
00098         } // namespace
00099 
00101 
00102         template<class T>
00103         typename detail::_type_of_<T>::return_type type_of()
00104         {
00105                 return detail::_type_of_<T>::get();
00106         }
00107 
00109 
00110         template<class T>
00111         typename detail::_type_of_<T>::return_type type_of(const T&)
00112         {
00113                 return detail::_type_of_<T>::get();
00114         }
00115 
00117 
00118         // Special version that deduces the size of an array
00119         template<class T, int S>
00120         array_type* type_of(T (&)[S])
00121         {
00122                 static array_type at(type_of<T>(), S);
00123                 return &at;
00124         }
